programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: How Can You Still Love Him?
programme.desc: Joyia is desperate to keep her friend Stephanie from going back to her abusive boyfriend Scott. If Stephanie takes him back, Scott will continue to abuse her. But she still loves him! Will she have the strength to leave him?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Bobbie says that her daughter Cindy’s home was filled with so many dangerous animals that she was forced to report her to child protective services because she felt her grandchild was in danger. But Cindy says Bobbie has another agenda!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: At 12, Crystal dated 20 year old Matt and was pregnant at 13. He served 15 months in prison for criminal sexual assault on a minor and is a registered sex offender. Are they a product of inappropriate love or just misunderstood?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Steve's looking back on some of the funniest moments from his show. You'll definitely laugh out loud at these unforgettable guests. Don't miss one second of the fun on today's Steve Wilkos Show.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Loretta and Joseph have been together for 2 years and have a young son together. She says that when she was pregnant, he punched and pulled her hair. She claims that she’s been faithful but Joseph isn’t convinced. Who’s telling the truth?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: TJ refuses to let Ashley see their child after a video of her blowing marijuana smoke into the baby’s face. Then, Tiffany blames Shawn for their 10 year old daughter’s smoking and wandering the streets. Can Steve intervene before it’s too late?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: My Daughter Tried to Poison Me
programme.desc: Thomazina’s boyfriend died a year ago and she thinks her daughter, Destiney slept with him! She also suspects Destiney tried to poison her with bleach! In December, Chris and Jesse’s baby died and they blame Jesse’s mother!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Steve I'm 14, I Need Your Help
programme.desc: 14 year old Rusty called our show because he says that he can no longer deal with his parent's constant fighting. He says that in the past they've hit each other, thrown appliances at each other and even bit him. His mother Mildred says that she and her husband Russell always fight and abuse each other because she suspects Russell of cheating.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Have Proof, You're Abusing Our Child
programme.desc: Robert says he believes that his daughters mother has been abusing her and he wants to prove the abuse and gain full custody of his daughter. Then, Casey claims her ex-boyfriend is abusive towards their kids and she wants him out of their lives.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Did Marcus’s ex’s boyfriend Charles molest their son? Ex Jamaica is torn between kicking out Charles for the meanwhile and wondering if Marcus’s girlfriend Tonya is lying to gain custody of the boy. What will Charles’s lie detector test say?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Cynthia says her two teen daughters are sexually active and out of control. She worries their actions will lead them to an early grave.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: There is nothing more serious than allegations of child abuse, but when all the testimonies are laid out, the stories just don't add up. Steve has the lie detector results and will reveal the truth once and for all.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Kaliegh is 23 and is a heroin addict. Her mother, best friend and ex-boyfriend who got her hooked on heroin in the first place, are here to beg her to go to rehab. Follow her as she travels to the rehab clinic and tries to get clean!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Nathan currently has 4 children with 2 different women and is in a serious mountain of trouble. Jamie, his first baby's mother, is tired of his lasting neglect for their 3 kids and needs him to step up to the role.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Katrina is fed up with her boyfriend Ismael's abusive and controlling ways. Katrina says Ismael acts this way because he believes she has been cheating. Then, Christie has been married to Chris for 8 months and he already suspects her infidelity.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Had a Threesome: Who's the Dad?
programme.desc: Tasha wants to prove to her ex boyfriend Martin that he's the father of her 4 year old daughter. Martin's sister says that she thinks the child might belong to her boyfriend Terrence because they had a threesome a year ago. Who's the real father?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Jessica can't make sense of her on again off again relationship with Wade and it's starting to drive her crazy. Wade however claims he's had nothing to do with Jessica and she's been spreading lies and stalking him for years.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Keith has been accused of touching his 3-year-old son inappropriately by Crystal, the mother of his children, which he strongly denies. He says this is the result of her anger over an affair he had. But will the lie detector test prove him right?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: First, Daniel has almost a dozen children with ten different women. While he admits to being their father, he refuses to care and provide for most of them. Then, Tadrianna strips and has sex for money and her mother, Kim, can't convince her to stop.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: After 10 years of searching, Brenda will reunite with her kids and address abuse allegations. Then, Cassidy wed Paul 5 days after she split with PJ, but is he molesting her and PJ’s son? Or is PJ the monster who burned their son’s feet?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Samantha believes that her 3 year old daughter was molested by her ex-boyfriend's brother, Chad. Chad denies sexually abusing the child and even took a voice stress test to prove his innocence. Now he wants to clear his name.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Where's That Fight For Your Son?
programme.desc: Colleen's son, Dalton has suffered with cancer for ten years. Patrick, the boy's father, left the picture when Dalton was only an infant, and after falling on hard times ended up homeless. But now he wants to be back in Dalton's life.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: A teenage boy abuses his mom, often getting his younger brother involved. He says that he got the idea when he'd witnessed one of his mother's boyfriends pull a knife on her.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Stephanie’s drug addiction led her to severely neglect and abuse their children. As Scott’s fiancée Amy has stepped in as a mother and Stephanie fails multiple drug tests, he doesn’t want her near the children, but wants her to atone for her wrongs!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Our Brother Should Be In Jail
programme.desc: Brandon spent time in jail after being accused of sexually abusing his niece. He maintains his innocence and claims that this isn’t the first time his niece has accused someone of molestation! Was she coached by his sister’s boyfriend Billy?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Perry and Stephanie started having an affair while Ashley was at rehab. Now Ashley is here to confront Perry for not taking responsibility for their daughter. Then, after they split up, Amanda started accusing James' new girlfriend of being abusive.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Saw You Through The Window
programme.desc: Laharla caught her mother's boyfriend Victor cheating when she saw him through their window. Then, Aaron claims that a woman named Olivia will not leave him alone after they met in person.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Don't Waste My Time / A Sister's Bad Influence
programme.desc: A woman whose fiancé tried to strangle her still believes he is a good guy; a teen who has lived a life of crime finds her younger sister following in her footsteps and wants to stop her.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: According to Drew, the baby was bottle-fed gin and died. Shawn, the grieving mother, claims she had no prior knowledge of the bottle containing gin and believes it was tampered with, possibly by her own sister and friend. Who’s responsible?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Do You Really Believe That 70 Year Old Is The Father?
programme.desc: Kerenina and Clay have a four-month-old son, but Clay cannot deny his suspicions that the child might actually have been fathered by their 71 year old roommate, William.
